name: Delving Deeper (Dr.Milk)
description:
This game was made for a student project! It has some issues, but it's a fun dungeon-crawling roguelite with a retro theme, with plenty of replayability and a dark-fantasy theme!  It also has a hidden easter egg somewhere in the mines... You can also check out the lore documents I made for the game here:
https://sites.google.com/view/thetomesofbalgorahm/home

It was originally meant to appear in-game in the form of various books you could find, but my text engine didn't have great support for large bodies of text.
